entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Style Context Menu #12817
  • Context Menu Programmatically Triggered #12816
  • Missing Buttons-Property in TapGestureRecognizer-Control #12815
  • MAUI rollbacks no longer publicly available causing build to fail #12814
  • code 2147942405 #12812
  • iOS: Application crashes after displaying SplashScreen #12809
  • Collection View ItemLayout property (Grid Item Layout and Linear Item Layout ) in C# has missing overloads #12806
  • MACOS VisualStates for radiobutton not working as intended? #12805

Closed

  • Entry control ClearButtonVisibility="WhileEditing" tap location moves #12192
    Backlog
  • [Win] Editor's CursorPosition and SelectionLength properties are not limited to Text.Length #7937
  • Bug in .NET MAUI Entry View for Android #9031
    Backlog
  • Toolbox is empty in Visual Studio #4571
    Backlog
  • Failed to build "xcrun exited with code 69" and "Class AppleTypeCRetimerRestoreInfoHelper is implemented in both" #6721
    Backlog
  • App crashes on startup in android when Code shrinker is set to r8 #8454
  • Error starting Android app: cannot locate symbol "mono_opt_aot_lazy_assembly_load" #7636
  • Add MtouchLink command to support XAML Hot Reload for iOS Devices #8429
    Backlog
  • Update Visual Studio's UI to allow developers to add platform-specific NuGets for MAUI SingleProject projects #10521
    Backlog
  • MAUI Android projects generate an \obj\Debug\net6.0-android\Resource.designer.cs file containing code that assigns values to const identifiers #9766
  • AOT everything is not AOTing everything #10236
  • Unable to record custom aot profile. #10237
  • Bound property does not update UI #12790
  • Rollback JSON file links are not accessible #12772
  • Entry - Different font for placeholder when password mode is enabled #11428
    Backlog
  • Splash Screen does not update iOS #8685
  • Exception when trying content popout to new window for CollectionView #12662
    Backlog
  • Swipe gestures blocked in MediaPlayer #12808

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix default item min height in CollectionView #12811
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Update sdk-insertion-bump.yml #12810
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12804
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Add more Essentials Permissions API Docs #12813
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net7.0] Fix Secondary Tap Scenarios on Android #12798
  • Fix password placeholder font issue on Android #12792
    area/controls 🎮
  • Generate unique filenames for iOS splash screens #10812
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Windows] Fix crash disconnecting CollectionView #12774
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Revert "Fix timing on iOS Toolbar (#12363)" #12788
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
    area/controls 🎮
  • Internalize MessagingCenter #12582
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix net8 TODOs in code #12577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Fix top margin modal #12661
    area/modal
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8 #12803
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Simplification of user interface declaration in code #12728
    community ✨
  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530
    platform/android 🤖, area/navigation 🧭, area/TabbedPage
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • Fix winui titleview measure #12484
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Correctly propagate BindingContext in all ContentView scenarios #12536
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [net7.0] Remove gesture from page that interferes with accessibility #12800
    area/gestures
  • [net7.0] Add more logging for BlazorWebView (#12357) #12801
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers from 3.3.3 to 3.3.4 #12742
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.0.1 to 4.1.0 #12768
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Build] Mega pipeline #12034
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecessary parent) #11439
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix shapes sizing and alignment #9607
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Align Graphics APIs naming with the rest of the platforms #12578
    t/bug, t/breaking 💥, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Moves Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Gtk into the Maui repo #9522
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, .NET 7 Planning
  • Add `UserAgent` property to `WebView` control. #10413
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview
